de.java2html.gui
Class GLabel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Canvas
          de.java2html.gui.GLabel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class GLabel
extends java.awt.Canvas

Similar to java.awt.Label, but can display multiple lines of text. For questions, suggestions, bug-reports, enhancement-requests etc. I may be contacted at: markus@jave.de The Java2html home page is located at: http://www.java2html.de

Version:
